title: Thundersnail

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Intercept** - Redirect all attacks against your target to yourself tonight.
- **Zap** - Attack someone. The tier is equal to the amount of charges in your Lightning Tower (0 = basic, 1 = powerful, 2 = unstoppable, 3 = overkill).
- **Shell Shield** - Give yourself basic defense tonight. 1 use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- **Snail Armor** - You have inverted defense. None and Weak attacks will kill you and Basic attacks will just injure you. If you're injured thrice, you will die. Anything more powerful than that will have no effect on you. Doesn't work against lynches.
- **Lightning Tower** - Each night where you take a hit, this attribute will gain a charge, up to a maximum of 3. It cannot be filled by any other means. When Zap is used, remove one charge.
- Snails can multitask.

...

- This role is shamelessly plagiarized from Noodle.
